LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.label: creació de lligam
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.0: tale_noun->la creació del lligam entre [human_nameShortDef] i [animal_nameShortDef]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[human_nameFull] formant un profund lligam amb [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[human_nameFull] adonant-se de com s'estima a [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] té aquella mirada d'embadalida d'aquells que estimen amb bogeria.
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] es planta ben dret i amb aparença noble.
LanguageData.BecameLover.label: relació d'amants
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] xiuxiuejant compliments a l'orella de [secondPawn_nameFull][circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] acompanyant al llit a [secondPawn_nameFull] agafats de la mà [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] fent un bon petó a [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->mentre els dos estan xops de suor
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] es cargola al costat de [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] i [secondPawn_nameShortDef] es miren als ulls.
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] i [secondPawn_nameShortDef] estàn abraçats molt estilísticament.
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] és la imatge de mirall de [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Breakup.label: ruptura
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] fent seure [secondPawn_nameFull] per tenir una conversa poc agradable [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] dret a certa distància de [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->en un moment de gran tristor
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] riu i plora al mateix temps.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] ha caigut al terra de la histèria.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] gesticula de forna enfadada a [firstPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Marriage.label: casament
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.0: tale_noun->la cerimònia de casament de [firstPawn_nameShortDef] i [secondPawn_nameShortDef]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] caminant per la catifa amb [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] i [secondPawn_nameFull] agafats de la ma durant el casament [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] i [secondPawn_nameShortDef] es miren als ulls.
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] és la imatge de mirall de [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
